sources.title: Strategic Air Command (1955) James Stewart · June Allyson
sources.description: A baseball player is reactivated in the U.S. Air Force to test nuclear-armed fighter jets.   A film that promotes the need for national nuclear defense preparedness and, in addition to a sentimental love story, features exciting aerial shots and technical details as highlights..

metadata.Plot: Lt. Col. Robert (Dutch) Holland was a third baseman for the St. Louis Cardinals, not a pitcher. While at spring training a B-36 flew over the field and Dutch was standing on third base. Brewster was his third base replacement when he, Dutch was re-called to duty. The movie clearly depicts this.
metadata.Actors: James Stewart, June Allyson, Frank Lovejoy
metadata.Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. 1 win & 2 nominations total
